miniupnpdctl

the communication between a running miniupnpd and miniupnpdctl is
established through a unix socket. "/var/run/miniupnpd.ctl"

miniupnpdctl can send the following commands :

1 - print all open sockets
2 - print config
3 - print current redirections

show options
show permissions/show perms?
show rdr
show opensockets

show all ?
